answer: A. Paul Naney, M.D. '43 (March), chief of the Medical Service and director of the Coronary Care Unit at Clay County Hospital in Flora, Ill., is doing a pilot program for the study of coronary care units in small hospitals under a grant from the U.S. Public Health Department. Dr. Naney took his internship at Pres- byterian Hospital in Chicago.
